title: üõ†Ô∏è QuickBooks Online tool MCP Server üí™ all 42 operations
description:
Need help? Want access to this workflow + many more paid workflows + live Q&A sessions with a top verified n8n creator?

[Join the community](https://www.skool.com/beyond-nodes-automation-lab-2006/about)

Complete MCP server exposing all QuickBooks Online Tool operations to AI agents. Zero configuration needed - all 42 operations pre-built.

## ‚ö° Quick Setup

1. **Import** this workflow into your n8n instance
2. **Activate** the workflow to start your MCP server
3. **Copy** the webhook URL from the MCP trigger node
4. **Connect** AI agents using the MCP URL

## üîß How it Works

‚Ä¢ **MCP Trigger**: Serves as your server endpoint for AI agent requests
‚Ä¢ **Tool Nodes**: Pre-configured for every QuickBooks Online Tool operation
‚Ä¢ **AI Expressions**: Automatically populate parameters via `$fromAI()` placeholders
‚Ä¢ **Native Integration**: Uses official n8n QuickBooks Online Tool tool with full error handling

## üìã Available Operations (42 total)

Every possible QuickBooks Online Tool operation is included:

### üîß Bill (5 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create a bill**
‚Ä¢ **Delete a bill**
‚Ä¢ **Get a bill**
‚Ä¢ **Get many bills**
‚Ä¢ **Update a bill**

### üîß Customer (4 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create a customer**
‚Ä¢ **Get a customer**
‚Ä¢ **Get many customers**
‚Ä¢ **Update a customer**

### üîß Employee (4 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create an employee**
‚Ä¢ **Get an employee**
‚Ä¢ **Get many employees**
‚Ä¢ **Update an employee**

### üîß Estimate (6 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create an estimate**
‚Ä¢ **Delete an estimate**
‚Ä¢ **Get an estimate**
‚Ä¢ **Get many estimates**
‚Ä¢ **Send an estimate**
‚Ä¢ **Update an estimate**

### üîß Invoice (7 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create an invoice**
‚Ä¢ **Delete an invoice**
‚Ä¢ **Get an invoice**
‚Ä¢ **Get many invoices**
‚Ä¢ **Send an invoice**
‚Ä¢ **Update an invoice**
‚Ä¢ **Void an invoice**

### üîß Item (2 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Get an item**
‚Ä¢ **Get many items**

### üîß Payment (7 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create a payment**
‚Ä¢ **Delete a payment**
‚Ä¢ **Get a payment**
‚Ä¢ **Get many payments**
‚Ä¢ **Send a payment**
‚Ä¢ **Update a payment**
‚Ä¢ **Void a payment**

### üîß Purchase (2 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Get a purchase**
‚Ä¢ **Get many purchases**

### üîß Transaction (1 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Get a report**

### üîß Vendor (4 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create a vendor**
‚Ä¢ **Get a vendor**
‚Ä¢ **Get many vendors**
‚Ä¢ **Update a vendor**

## ü§ñ AI Integration

**Parameter Handling**: AI agents automatically provide values for:
‚Ä¢ Resource IDs and identifiers
‚Ä¢ Search queries and filters
‚Ä¢ Content and data payloads
‚Ä¢ Configuration options

**Response Format**: Native QuickBooks Online Tool API responses with full data structure

**Error Handling**: Built-in n8n error management and retry logic

## üí° Usage Examples

Connect this MCP server to any AI agent or workflow:

‚Ä¢ **Claude Desktop**: Add MCP server URL to configuration
‚Ä¢ **Custom AI Apps**: Use MCP URL as tool endpoint
‚Ä¢ **Other n8n Workflows**: Call MCP tools from any workflow
‚Ä¢ **API Integration**: Direct HTTP calls to MCP endpoints

## ‚ú® Benefits

‚Ä¢ **Complete Coverage**: Every QuickBooks Online Tool operation available
‚Ä¢ **Zero Setup**: No parameter mapping or configuration needed
‚Ä¢ **AI-Ready**: Built-in `$fromAI()` expressions for all parameters
‚Ä¢ **Production Ready**: Native n8n error handling and logging
‚Ä¢ **Extensible**: Easily modify or add custom logic

> üÜì **[Free for community use](https://github.com/Cfomodz/community-use)!** Ready to deploy in under 2 minutes.
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
